title: Scientific Reasoning Development Program for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of secondary science subjects and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Conducted as Short-Intensive Microlearning in Mobile Environments Using Digital Devices, with Learning Outcomes Measured Through Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: 20% improvement in variable control ability (pre- and post-assessment comparison).
85% achievement rate in science problem-solving tasks applying the hypothetico-deductive reasoning process.
100% submission rate of project outcomes utilizing sub-elements of scientific reasoning (variable control, hypothetico-deductive reasoning, conservation concepts, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
